page.title: 09EMPLOYMENT WITHIN GT.BENTLEY
page.content: FARMING IS BY FAR THE GREATEST PROVIDER OF EMPLOYMENT WITHIN THE AREA. THERE ARE A LARGE NUMBER OF PERMANENT JOBS WHICH INCREASES DRASTICALLY DURING THE SUMMER MONTHS WHEN EXTRA WORKERS ARE NEEDED IN THE FIELDS. THE SMALL INDUSTRIAL SETATE PROVIDES A LARGE NUMBER OF JOBS IN THE LIGHT ENGINEERING TRADE AS WELL AS THE OFFICE BACKUP STAFF. ALMOST ALL OF THE EMPLOYMENT WITHIN THE AREA GOES TO LOCAL PEOPLE,WITH MANY OTHERS HAVING TO TRAVEL OUT OF THE AREA TO FIND EMPLOYMENT. SOME TRAVEL TO LONDON, OTHERS NEARER TO COLCHESTER AND CLACTON. THERE ARE A CONSIDERABLE NUMBER OF SELF-EMPLOYED PEOPLE IN TRADES SUCH AS ELECTRICIAN, CARPENTER, PLUMMER AND BUILDER. AS WITH MANY OTHER PLACES THERE IS A DEGREE OF UNEMPLOYMENT WITHIN THE AREA, SOME QUITE LONG TERM.
